statements: UPDATE mobile_app_usage_data SET time_spent_in_app = 120 WHERE user_id = 101
UPDATE mobile_app_usage_data SET ads_clicked = 2, promotions_viewed = 5 WHERE user_id = 102
UPDATE mobile_app_usage_data SET time_spent_in_app = 3600, ads_clicked = 5 WHERE user_id = 123 AND app_id = 456;
UPDATE mobile_app_usage_data SET promotions_viewed = 10, ads_clicked = ads_clicked + 1 WHERE user_id = 789 AND app_id = 123;
UPDATE users SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE app_usage SET duration = '1 hour 30 minutes', event_type = 'Login' WHERE user_id = '87654321-12d3-b456-e89b-123a456789ab' AND app_id = 'ab123456-d3b-4567-89e8-789012a34567';
UPDATE users SET location = 'New York', age = 30 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE app_usage SET event_type = 'Login', end_time = '2022-09-07 15:30:00' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001' AND session_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';
UPDATE UserActivity SET duration_minutes = 60 WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE AdImpressions SET ad_revenue = 15.99, impression_time = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE UserActivity SET duration_minutes = 30 WHERE user_id = 123 AND app_id = 456;
UPDATE AdImpressions SET ad_revenue = 15.75, impression_time = '2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE impression_id = 789;
UPDATE app_users SET age = 35 WHERE user_id = 1001;
UPDATE ad_impressions SET ad_id = 205, impression_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE impression_id = 5001;
